block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 3,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 11 1/2-ft. ceilings, 12 oversize windows, c/a, 2 exposures, washer/dryer in unit; maintenance $1,326, 48% tax-deductible; listed at $1.25 million, 11 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 3,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 11 1/2-ft. ceilings, 12 oversize windows, c/a, 2 exposures, washer/dryer in unit; maintenance $1,326, 48% tax-deductible; listed at $1.25 million, 11 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, marble baths, 3 exposures, East River view, roof deck and pool in building; common charge $706; taxes $7,200; listed at $599,900, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

535-sq.-ft. studio condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, 2 exposures, Union Square Park view; common charge $358; taxes $2,244; listed at $325,000, 14 weeks on market (Broker: Sumitomo)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, high beamed ceilings, south exposure; maintenance $1,100, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $550,000, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Halstead Property Co.; Brown Harris Stevens)

3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; part-time doormen, maid's room, dining room, eat-in kitchen, high ceilings; common charge $582; taxes $1,560; listed at $650,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: A. J. Clarke)

2-bedroom, 1-bath, 850-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; elevator, dining area, eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, h/ w floors, 2 exposures; maintenance $432, 15% tax-deductible; listed at $50,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Jeskill)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 15-year-old semiattached town house; dining area, finished basement, 1-car garage, 69-by-71-ft. lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $3,000; listed at $275,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Trebach)

4-bedroom, 2-bath, 70-year-old attached brick house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, h/w floors, finished basement, 18-by-80-ft. lot; taxes $1,660; listed at $389,000, 14 weeks on market (Broker: Century 21/DeMasi)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a brownstone; dining area, large living room with bay window, fireplace, oak floors, pocket doors, balcony, washer/dryer in unit; maintenance $599, 65% tax-deductible; listed at $319,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Heights Berkeley)
3-bedroom, 2-bath, 103-year-old semiattached frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, pine floors, tin ceilings; taxes $897; listed at $349,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Aguayo & Huebener)

4-bedroom, 2-bath, 80-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, sun room, new siding, windows, walkways and driveway, 1-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,100; listed at $443,999, 10 weeks on market (Brokers: ReMax/Millennium; Premium Properties)

3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 65-year-old attached brick house; dining room, h/ w floors, full basement, 1-car garage, 18-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,900; listed at $320,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Advantage F.H. Realty)

3-bedroom, 1-bath, 82-year-old colonial; enclosed porch, dining room, eat-in kitchen, h/w floors, 2-car garage with loft, 100-by-150-ft. lot; taxes $2,408; listed at $389,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Kingsley)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,902-sq.-ft. condo in a 12-year-old building; a/c, h/w floors, Hudson River views; common charge $646; taxes $8,008; listed at $515,000, 7 months on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)
4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 15-year-old colonial; fireplace, family room, full basement, c/a, 0.52-acre lot; taxes $8,291; listed at $439,900, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)
6-bedroom, 1-bath, 47-year-old colonial; h/w floors, full basement, porch, 1-car garage, 68-by-128-ft. lot; taxes $3,954; listed at $142,900, 1 day on market (Broker: Weichert)

5-bedroom, 3-bath, 49-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, finished basement, 1-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $9,803; listed at $470,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Jan Kalman Realty)

4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 20-year-old Dutch colonial; dining room, family room with fireplace, full basement, hospitality suite, in-ground pool, 2-car garage, 5-stall barn, 2 paddocks and ring on 1-acre lot; taxes $10,464; listed at $425,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Anastasio Associates)

5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 24-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, family room, whirlpool, fireplace, rear deck, new furnace, 2-car garage, 0.96-acre lot; taxes $5,684; listed at $469,900, 45 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 33-year-old split-level; dining room, family room, fireplace, rear deck, h/w floors, c/a, 1-car garage, 1.01-acre lot; taxes $3,510; listed at $277,000, 10 weeks on market (Brokers: William Raveis; William Pitt)

5-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath antique saltbox-style home built in 1744; dining room, great room, master bedroom with vaulted ceilings, 5 fireplaces, original moldings and detail, 1-car garage, 1.32-acre lot; taxes $5,877; listed at $850,000, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: William Raveis; Coldwell Banker/Norwalk)

3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 48-year-old colonial renovated last year; dining room, library, family room, solarium, rear deck, 2-car garage, 0.47-acre lot; taxes $6,673; listed at $995,000, 9 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Connecticut; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 70-year-old colonial; enclosed heated porch, fireplace, beamed ceilings, dining room, eat-in kitchen; 0.33-acre lot; taxes $8,926; listed at $459,000, 16 weeks on market (Brokers: Hudson Homes; Houlihan/Lawrence)

2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. condo in a 72-year-old building; entry hall, fireplace, dining room, modern kitchen, powder room, parking; common charge $337; taxes $6,443; listed at $369,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Ragette)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. condo in a 73-year-old building; entry hall, dining room, pool, clubhouse, exercise room, tennis, parking; common charge $415; taxes $2,100; listed at $133,000 (multiple bids), 5 weeks on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)

4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 58-year-old Cape Cod; fireplace, office, sun room, skylights, full finished basement, 1-car attached garage; 3/4-acre lot; taxes $8,386; listed at $445,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)
